stanza.line: Thus is his cheek the map of days outwornoutworn
When beauty lived and died as flowers do nownow
Before these bastard signs of fair were bornborn
Or durst inhabit on a living browbrow
Before the golden tresses of the deaddead
The right of sepulchres were shorn awayaway
To live a second life on second headhead
Ere beauty dead fleece made another gaygay
In him those holy antique hours are seenseen
Without all ornament it self and truetrue
Making no summer of another greengreen
Robbing no old to dress his beauty newnew
And him as for a map doth Nature storestore
To show false Art what beauty was of yoreyore
